title: Drawing, Vulcan, Design for Vaulted Ceiling, Sala dei Legislatori, Palazzo Conti-Sinibaldi, Faenza, 1787–1802
title_raw: Vulcan, Design for Vaulted Ceiling, Sala dei Legislatori, Palazzo Conti-Sinibaldi, Faenza
medium: Pen and ink, brush and bistre wash over black chalk on rolled paper
inscribed: Inscribed in ink, inside an oval: Volcano invent delle arti; top left, perhaps part of "7."
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Vulcan shown in profile, seated beside anvil toward left, inside cave. Right hand holds group of Three Graces, left hand holds hammer. Distant view of volcano. Inscribed inside oval: Volcano invent delle arti. Top left, perhaps part of "7."

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Vulcan, Design for Vaulted Ceiling, Sala dei Legislatori, Palazzo Conti-Sinibaldi, Faenza, 1787–1802. Pen and ink, brush and bistre wash over black chalk on rolled paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3433
